name: Miro Portable
short_description:
Made by HackZor 

Thank you for downloading this file.

This version of Miro 6.0 is fully customizable and totally portable.
All files are stored in the "Miro" folder, that will be created after you run the program for the first time.
If you want to reset the software, delete the "Miro" folder inside the "Portable Miro" one.

Also, if it is the first time that you run Miro, please be patient, it will take several minutes.

For Windows Vista/7/8 Users:
run the program with Administrator Rights.


Tested on: 

Windows XP service pack 3 (32 and 64 bit)
Windows 7 64 bit

It should work also for you.

Please note that the software is open source and free of charge.
